snippet: ARFFA--Robert C. The partners, counsel, associates and staff of the firm of Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton and Garrison LLP express profound sorrow at the death of Dr. Robert C. Arffa, beloved brother of our friend and partner Allan J. Arffa. We express our deepest sympathies to Allan, Kay and to all other members of the family. 1/3
